arabic.title: Ana andi kalam
text: انا عندى كلام وحنين وغرام وحاجات جوايا قلبى شايلها
وانا ايدى فى ايدك وانا عينى فى عنيك ولا حتى حبيبى بقدر اقولها
فى عنيه انسا انا مين بيتوه قلبى معاه
وداريت شوقى انا ليه دى سنين بتمناه
انا عندى كلام وحنين وغرام وحاجات جوايا قلبى شايلها
وانا ايدى فى ايدك وانا عينى فى عنيك ولا حتى حبيبى بقدر اقولها
وانا هعمل فى اللى بقيت فى انا مشغول بيه بس بخبى
بعمل كده ليه وهيحصل ايه لو اقوله فى يوم على اللى فى قلبى
فى عنيه انسا انا مين بيتوه قلبى معاه
وداريت شوقى انا ليه دى سنين بتمناه
انا عندى كلام وحنين وغرام وحاجات جوايا قلبى شايلها
وانا ايدى فى ايدك وانا عينى فى عنيك ولا حتى حبيبى بقدر اقولها

english.title: I have Some Words
text: I have some words(to say), nostalgia, love, and some other things inside of me  that  my heart is carrying
And I have my hand in his/her hand, and our eyes are looking straight at each other, but still I can't say it
Because of his/her eyes, I forgot whom my heart strayed with
And I have been longing for him/her, and for years I wish I had him/her
I have some words(to say), nostalgia, love, and some other things inside of me  that  my heart is carrying
And I have my hand in his/her hand, and our eyes are looking straight at each other, but still I can't say it
And what will I do about the one that I love, but I keep that (feeling)a secret
Why do I do this? And what will happen if tell him/her about what's in my heart?
Because of his/her eyes, I forgot whom my heart stray with
And I have been longing for him/her, and for years I wish I had him/her
I have some words(to say), nostalgia, love, and some other things inside of me  that  my heart is carrying
And I have my hand in his/her hand, and our eyes are looking straight at each other, but still I can't say it

arabic.title: Da Kalam
text: Dah kalam baa da esmoh kalam
Betkhaf, leih men el ayam
Maaoul, ya habibi ansak
Ansak, ya habibi ezzay
Wo maak, el omr el gay
Dih senen bahlam be loak
Law hobbak nar be demou teed
Agmal be ketir ma el gana baeed
Wo el donya dih eih law kont waheed
Wo haeesh ezzay law mesh wayak
Law hobbak nar be demou teed
Agmal be ketir ma el gana baeed
Wo el donya dih eih law kont waheed
Wo haeesh ezzay law mesh wayak
Dah kalam baa da esmoh kalam
Betkhaf, leih men el ayam
Maaoul, ya habibi ansak
Law youm habibi hazin
Wo daret damaak fe el ein
Aala toul babky ableek
Hanadeek wo fe hodny adareek
Wo bagheer men rouhy aleik
Walla youm ana kont nasek
Law hobbak nar be demou teed
Agmal be ketir ma el gana baeed
Wo el donya dih eih law kont waheed
Wo haeesh ezzay law mesh wayak
Law hobbak nar be demou teed
Agmal be ketir ma el gana baeed
Wo el donya dih eih law kont waheed
Wo haeesh ezzay law mesh wayak
Dah kalam baa da esmoh kalam
Betkhaf, leih men el ayam
Maaoul, ya habibi ansak

english.title: Is this talk?
text: Is this logical,can you call this logic (what kind of talk is this?do you call this talk?)
why are you scared of the days
is it possible my love that i will forget you
forget you my love how
and with you is  the coming life
it is years I am dreaming to see you
if your love is fire my tears fuel it
much prettier then the paradise far away
and what is the value of the world when you are lonely
and how am i living when i am not with you
if your love is fire my tears are flaring it
much prettier then the paradise far away
and what is the value of the world when you are lonely
and how am i living when i am not with you
Is this logical,can you call this logic
why are you scared of the days
is it possible my love that i will forget you
if one day my love you are  sad
and hid the tears in your eyes
right the way I will cry before you
I will call you and cover you with my embrace
I am joules of my self over you
I have never forgotten you

arabic.title: Sina
text: Sina ,sina ma3naha eeh
Koli da 3ashan eeh
Howa eeh fil kon zaeda 3aleh
Sina sina arda allah
Ele karamha ,yom ma kallam moussa w wasa 3aleh
Mahd lil dianat sina sina
Anbya w risalat sina sina
Law knouz el-dnya ma tswa shebr wa7d fiha
Mazkora fil qor2an sina sina
Dar el-salam w aman
Ibrahim wil 3adra w 3issa w yousuf xato 3aleha
Sina ibno ra7 w magash
Ma da3shi 7a2o balash
Lamma kan fi 7arb mastanash
Sina gat bi tad7eeat w 7ob inkar zat
Sina gat bi salam masalimnash
Sina sina 7a2ek gab 3oumro yom matsab
Yama da7o kbar sghar w shabab
Sina sina ya3ne salam ,soura ah ya salam
3al gamal el-sa7el el-khalab
Sina tim3ou fiha kteer bas dafa3o kteer
Ard tahra w leha rab kbeer
Sina min bedaitil kon
Rabbak khala2ha tkon rz2aha was3 w kolaha kher

english.title: Sinai
text: Sina ,whats the meaning of it?
All of this for what?
Is there any thing in the universe that’s more in it?
Sina sina the land of God
Which honor it and told moussa (one of the prophets) to take care about it
Cradle for religions sina sina
Prophets and letters sina sina
All the treasures of the world don’t equal one inch of it
Its mentioned in Qu’ran
The home of peace and safety
Ibrahim , virgin mary ,Jesus , Joseph, walked on it
Sina’s son went and didn’t come back
He didn’t lose his right for nothing
When the war came ,he never waited
Sina came with sacrifices of self denial
Sina came with peace ,we didn’t reply it
Sina has a pride that never left
They sacrificed a lot of grown-ups and youth
Sina means peace ,an image of peace
What a charming beauty
Sina was desired by greedy people and they paid a lot
It’s a pure land and has a great God
Sina from the start of the universe
God created it and it expanded with goodness

arabic.title: Ya Ghaly Alaya
text: Wana amout ba3deek
mel shou2 dah el hawa ghadar
ayam we sneen banadeek
wana 3omry lemeen gheer leek
wana bandah feen aradeek
leil waya nehar
ya ghaly 3alaya
aghla maleya
kol el dounia deya
wala teghla 3aleek
ya ghaly 3alaya
rou7y we 3ainaya
emta te7es beya
allah yerdeek
fi hawak leily tal we wa7eed
wana sho2y 3amal bezeed
7ayart el bal wenta be3eed
makfaya be3aad
7ayartny leih ana bahwak
wely mekhabeeh gowak
wana law 7asal eih hal2ak
law bena blaad
ya ghaly 3alaya
aghla maleya
kol el dounia deya
wala teghla 3aleek
ya ghaly 3alaya
rou7y we 3ainaya
emta te7es beya
allah yerdeek
mashghoul ana beek 7ayran
ana mestaneek sahran
Wana amout ba3deek
mel shou2 dah el hawa ghadar
ayam we sneen banadeek
wana 3omry lemeen gheer leek
wana bandah feen aradeek
leil waya nehar
ya ghaly 3alaya
aghla maleya
kol el dounia deya
wala teghla 3aleek
ya ghaly 3alaya
rou7y we 3ainaya
emta te7es beya
allah yerdeek

english.title: Ya Ghaly Alaya
text: will i die after you
of the longing?cause the love is treacherous
i'vez been calling you for days and years
to whom my life is for but to you?
and i'm calling out loud "where are you?"
every night and day
oh my precious one
the most precious of what i have
all this world
is not precious enough for you
oh my precious one
my soul and eyes
when will you feel me?
may allah satisfies you
my night got longer in your love
and my longing is increasing gradually
you perplexed my mind while y ou're away
so enough separation
why do you perplexe me while i love you?
and what you're hiding inside you
and whatever happens i'll find you
even if there is a country between us (even if you are behinde the seas)
ya ghaly 3alaya
aghla maleya
kol el dounia deya
wala teghla 3aleek
ya ghaly 3alaya
rou7y we 3ainaya
emta te7es beya
allah yerdeek
i'm occupied and perplexed by you
and waiting for you sleeplessly
will i die after you
of the longing?cause the love is treacherous
ayam we sneen banadeek
wana 3omry lemeen gheer leek
wana bandah feen aradeek
leil waya nehar
ya ghaly 3alaya
aghla maleya
kol el dounia deya
wala teghla 3aleek
ya ghaly 3alaya
rou7y we 3ainaya
emta te7es beya
allah yerdeek

arabic.title: Ya Reitak
text: ياريتك كنت حاسس بيا او بتحبنى
(Ya reitak kent 7ases biye aw bet7bni)
ياريتك كنت خايف على اللى بينا ياريت كده
(Ya reitak kent 5ayef 3la ely beina ya reitak kda)
مكنش هيحصل اللى وصلنا ليه
(Makansh 7a9al ely wa9alna leih)
ده انا فى اى حاجة ببص بلاقيك سيبتنى
(Da ana fi ay 7aga babo9 bala2ik sibteni)
واسهل حاجة عندك لما تنسا الحب ده
(We as-hal 7aga 3endak lama tensa al7ob da)
لكنى خلاص عرفت الحل ايه
(Lakeni 5ala9 3ereft el7al eih)
اللى شافنا فى اختلافنا قال ده عادى
(Ely shafna fi e5telafna 2al da 3adi)
شى بيجرا لاى حد امر عادى
(Shi beyegra le ay 7ad amr 3adi)
والحقيقة ان اصلا مش لبعض
(Wel7a2i2a en a9lan msh leba36')
حاولت كتير معاك راضى بهواك مستحمله
(7awelt ktir ma3ak ra6' bhawak mesta7mlo)
اتارى معاك بضيع اتارى قلبى بعذبه
(Atari ma3ak ba6'i3 atari 2albi be3adhebu)
سنين وانا روحى بيك متعلقة
(Senin wana ro7i beik met3ala2a)
اسيب نفسك لنفسك هو ده اللى انا هعمله
(Asib nafsak linafsak hwa daly ana ha3melo)
واى غرام هقابله بعد منك احسبه
(Weay gharam ha2ablo b3d menak a7sebo)
عشان مغلتطش تانى خلاص بقا
(3ashan ma3'la6shi tani 5ala9 ba2a)
اللى شافنا فى اختلافنا قال ده عادى
(Ely shafna fi e5telafna 2al da 3adi)
شى بيجرا لاى حد امر عادى
(Shi beyegra le ay 7ad amr 3adi)
والحقيقة ان اصلا مش لبعض
(Wel7a2i2a en a9lan msh leba36')

english.title: Wama Ya Reitak
text: If only you could feel me or love me
If only you were afraid for(took care of) what's between us. If only you were like this
What we are at now wouldn't have happened
Where ever I look I find(see that) you left me
And the easiest thing for you is when you forget this love
But now I know what the solution is
Those who saw us in our disagreement said it's something normal
Something that happens to anyone. Something normal
The truth is we're actually not for eachother
I tried a lot with you. Satisfied in your love, tolerating it
"I found out" that I'll get lost with you, "I found out" that my heart is gonna be tortured
Years and my soul is stuck with you
I'm gonna leave you for yourself. That's what I'm gonna do
And I will "count" any love after you
So that I want do another mistake. It's enough
Those who saw us in our disagreement said it's something normal
Something that happens to anyone. Something normal
The truth is we're actually not for eachother

arabic.title: استنى ايه
text: انا عشت سنين في حياتي بحالها اتمناه
قجأة انا الاقيه جنبي
وحلمت كتير بحياتي عايشها وانا معاها
مش هقدر اداري ولا اخبي
استنى ايه ايه ايه
ده انا كل حاجة كان نفسي فيها فيه
واستنى ليه ليه ليه
ده انا حلم عمري اعيش طول حياتي ليه
x2
ده انا لو اشوف عينيه
بنسى انا كنت هقوله ايه
x2
ايه جرالي من يوم ما اتقابلنا
واتمنى ايه تاني
ما انا عشت اتمناه ايه
ده اللي هيبقى بيننا
كل حياتي هعيشها معاه
ده انا لو اشوف عينيه
بنسى انا كنت هقوله ايه
ده انا هموت عليه
انا بقى لسا بعيش اليه
انا نفسي اعيش معاه
انا نفسي اعيش معاه
نفسي اوصله حاجات جوايا كده كتير
نفسي اعيش ليه عمري
انا مش محتاج تاني افكر من غير تفكير
ده انا مستنيه اه من بدري
من قد ايه
وانا نفسي اقول كلام قلبي مداريه
طيب اقوله ايه ايه ايه
وانا مهما اقول كلام هوصف انا ايه
x2
انا ليه هموت عليه
انا بقى نفسي افهم في ايه
x2
انا نفسي اعيش معاه
من يوم ما اتقابلنا
واتمنى ايه تاني
ما انا عشب اتمنى ايه
ده اللي هيبقى بينا
كل حياتي هعيشها معاه
ده انا لو اشوف
بنسى انا كنت
ده انا لو اشوف عينيه
بنسى انا كنت هقوله ايه
استنى ايه ايه ايه
ده انا كل حاجة كان نفسي فيها فيه
واستنى ليه ليه ليه

english.title: What Am I Waiting For?
text: I lived entire years of my life waiting for her
And suddenly I find her next to me
And I dreamt a lot in my life living my life with her
I won't be able to hide
What am I waiting for?
For all I ever wanted is in her
And why should I wait?
For I am living the dream of my life for her
x2
When I see her eyes
I forget what I was going to say to her
x2
What happened to me since the day we met?
And what else could I hope for?
The thing that I lived hoping for
Whatever happens between us
I will live the rest of my life with
When I see her eyes
I forget what I was going to say to her
I am crazy about her
I live just for her
I want to live with her
I want to live with her
I really want to express to her things inside me
I want to live my life for her
I don't need to think about it again brashly
Yes I have been waiting for her for so long
For so long
I have wanted to say what was hidden in my heart
So what, what should I tell her
No matter what I say, what can I describe?
x2
Why am I crazy about her?
I just want to understand what's happening
x2
I want to live with her
From the day we met
And what else could I hope for?
The thing that I lived hoping for
Whatever happens between us
I will live the rest of my life with
When I see
I forget what I
When I see her eyes
I forget what I was going to say
What am I waiting for?
For all I ever wanted is in her
And why should I wait?

arabic.title: رايحة جاية
text: لا لا لا لا لا ...
[ترديد]
طول ما انت رايحة جاية
شدانى واخدة قلبى و عينيا
قوليلى ايه اللى انت عاملاه فيا .. عاملة لى ايه
دا انا لو تعدى جنبى
والله يفضل يدق قلبى
قدام عينيك ماقدرش اخبى .. اللى مداريه
[ترديد]
طول ما انت رايحة جاية
شدانى واخدة قلبى و عينيا
قوليلى ايه اللى انت عاملاه فيا .. عاملة لى ايه
عينى عليكى , و باحب فيكى انا من زمان
باستنى اشوفك و باحلم كمان .. آخد فى قلبك مكان
بعدين معاكى .. انا وراكى ولو رحتى فين
انا مش هاسيبك و اسيبك لمين .. دا انا ممكن اصبر سنين
[ترديد]
طول ما انت رايحة جاية
شدانى واخدة قلبى و عينيا
قوليلى ايه اللى انت عاملاه فيا .. عاملة لى ايه
استنى ثانية واحدة .. قوليلى انشا الله كلمة واحدة
حظك يا قلبى بتحب واحدة مغلباك
مش محتاجة لمجاملة .. هاتيلى ف الدنيا واحدة كاملة
رقة و براءة عارفة انت عاملة .. زى الملاك
[ترديد]
طول ما انت رايحة جاية
شدانى واخدة قلبى و عينيا
قوليلى ايه اللى انت عاملاه فيا .. عاملة لى ايه

english.title: Going & Coming
text: la la la la lla lala...
[Refrain]
Always when you're going & coming,
Attracting me, taking my heart & my eyes.
Tell me what's that you're doing to me.. What you're doing to me!!
I'm if you pass beside me, I swear to God (W Allahi), it keeps on beating, my heart (=~ my heart keeps on beating)
In front of your eyes I can't hide.. whatever I'm concealing
[Refrain]
Always when you're going & coming,
Attracting me, taking my heart & my eyes
Tell me what's that you're doing to me.. What you're doing to me!!
My eyes are on you.. & loving you I am since long.
Waiting to see you & dreaming as well.. to take in your heart a place.
What's then (=~next) with you! .. I'm after you, even if you go wherever.
I'm not leaving you, & leave you to whom !.. I can wait in patience for years.
[Refrain]
Always when you're going & coming,
Attracting me, taking my heart & my eyes
Tell me what's that you're doing to me.. What you're doing to me!!
Wait (~with me) one second.. Tell me even only one word (even one lone word).
It's your misfortune, my heart, loving someone giving you hard time (exhausting U)
Without need for compliments (=~U don't need any compliment).. Show me in the world any one perfect like that!! ...  Tenderness & innocence, you know, you're like an angel.
[Refrain]
Always when you're going & coming,
Attracting me, taking my heart & my eyes
Tell me what's that you're doing to me.. What you're doing to me!!

arabic.title: كان نفسي
text: كان نفسي عيني تشوف ملامحك
في الدنيا وأفرح ويّا فرحك
في الجنة أشوفك وسط أهلك
وسط الدعاة والصالحين
وتشوفني وكأنك عارفني
وتبص لي وتنده باسمي!
واجري عليك وأحس اني
في اللحظة دي م المؤمنين
خلّدت في الإسلام مكانك
يا رحمة جات للعالمين
ياربّي بدعيلك تخلّي
طريقي في الإسلام طريقه
وسط الصحابة معاه أصلّي
واكتب لي اني أكون صديقه
فيه كلام كتير أوي ليك في قلبي
ما رضيتش أقوله غير وانته جنبي
خليك معايا واشفع لي ذنبي
ده انته الإمام وانته الأمين

english.title: I wished
text: I wished my eyes could see your face
In dunya and be happy for your happiness
I wish I can see you in Janna among your people
Among Daa'ias and good people (saleheen)
And you look at me as if you knew me
Then you call me by name
And I run towards you and I feel
In this exact moment that I'm from The Believers
Your footsteps in Islam's path are immortal
You, the Mercy upon Mankind
O God I'm praying to you
To let my path in Islam be as his (path)
And to let me pray behind him among the Sahaba
And to make me his friend
I have lots of talk in my heart for you
But I didn't want to say any until I set beside you
Be with me and intercede my sins
You are the Imam and you are The Amin (Trustworthy)

arabic.title: ليلة العمر
text: حبيبي الليلة نفسي اسأل سؤال
معقول انا بين ايديك وسط الناس كلها
هموت واعرف بتعمل فيّ ايه
لما ببص في عينيك ميت حاجة بحسها
احلى حياة الليلة بدأتها
فرحتى بيك جيالي في وقتها
وليلة العمر دي بداية لعمر جديد
وغيرك مين الليلة يهمني
قرب قول يا حبيبي وحشتني
وصعب تكون ولو ثانية في حياتي بعيد
في اول يوم زمان كان نفسي اقول حبيتك قد ايه
اول ما عرفتني
كفاية اللية اقول غيرك ما ليش وكفاية بدأت اعيش
اول ما لمستنى
احلى حياة الليلة بدأتها
فرحتى بيك جيالي في وقتها
واليلة العمر دي بداية لعمر جديد
وغيرك مين الليلة يهمني
قرب قول يا حبيبي وحشتني
وصعب تكون ولو ثانية في حياتي بعيد

english.title: The Night of My Life
text: Darling tonight I want to ask a question
Is it possible that among all these people I am with you
I would die to know what you do to me
When I look into your eyes I feel a thousand things
Tonight I started the most beautiful life
My happiness about you came to me at the right time
This is the night of our life and the beginning of a new life
And tonight you are the only person who is important to me
Come closer and say "my darling, I missed you"
And that it's hard for you to be away from me for even a second
On the first day a long time ago I wanted to tell you how much I loved you
Once you knew me
Enough, tonight I'm saying that I don't have anything without you and I started living
Once you touched me
Tonight I started the most beautiful life
My happiness about you came to me at the right time
This is the night of our life and the beginning of a new life
And tonight you are the only person who is important to me
Come closer and say "my darling, I missed you"
And that it's hard for you to be away from me for even a second

arabic.title: ليه لأ
text: ليه لأ .. أسبقها .. مش فارقة
مين فينا للتانى هايقولها
ماخلاص لازم تتقال
أنا إيه يرجعنى  .. إيه يعنى .. يمنعنى
لما أقولها وتسمعنى
كلمة وبعديها سؤال
طاب ليه بقى لأ
فيها إيه .. ده اللى احنا فيه
مش هنلاقيه .. ولا حتى فى الأحلام
دى الحياة .. واحنا سوا
أجمل حياة .. مافيهاش كلام
ليه لأ .. أسبقها .. مش فارقة
مين فينا للتانى هايقولها
ماخلاص لازم تتقال
أنا إيه يرجعنى  .. إيه يعنى .. يمنعنى
لما أقولها وتسمعنى
كلمة وبعديها سؤال
طاب ليه بقى لأ
ــــــــــ
لو أقولك .. و أوصفلك .. و أشرحلك
ازاى كنت عايش قبلك
وخلاص دلوقتى هاقول
أيوة أنا بحبك .. أنا عايزك .. وهعيشلك
نفسي إنى أنا أفضل جنبك
لو مهما العمر يطول
خدى بس هأقولك
فيها إيه
فيها إيه
ليه لأ
أنا إيه يرجعنى
ليه لأ
أنا إيه يرجعنى

english.title: Why Not
text: Why not.. I can before her.. It won't make a difference
Who is going to say it to the the other1
It's due & must be said.
What could make me retreat!.. what harm would.. prevent me
When I say it & you listen to me
A word followed by a question2
Why not then
What could be wrong with that.. How we are here,
We will never find such.. not even in dreams
Life.. while we're together
Is the most beautiful life.. Without words (We don't even need words)
Why not.. I can before her.. It won't make a difference
Who is going to say it to the the other
It's due & must be said.
What could make me retreat.. what harm would.. prevent me
When I say it & you listen to me
A word followed by a question
Why not then
ــــــــــ
If I tell you.. describe to you.. & explain to you
How I used to live before you
And now I'm going to tell
Yes, I love you.. I want you.. & I will live for you
I wish I remain beside you
No matter how long (my) lifetime will prolong
Come here, just let me tell you
What could be wrong with that!
What could be wrong with that!
Why not!
What could make me retreat!
Why not!
What could make me retreat!
